name: Navaneet Jayakrishnan
headline: ECE undergrad building backend systems, AI-powered applications, and bio-inspired computing models
bio: I am an Electronics and Communication Engineering undergraduate at NIT Calicut with strong interests in backend development, applied AI, and neuromorphic systems. I have worked on research-oriented signal processing problems, AI-driven automation, and scalable backend systems, and I enjoy building production-grade APIs and explainable intelligent systems.

education.degree: B.Tech in Electronics and Communication Engineering

experience.description: Worked on neural signal analysis and computational modeling, gaining hands-on experience in signal processing and data interpretation for bio-inspired systems.
Automated complex workflows using AI, focusing on optimization, integration, and scalable software solutions applicable to product development.
Developed a full-stack system with an innovative WhatsApp-based interface, emphasizing usability, scalability, and user engagement.
